title: Beneath a Steel Sky
notes: Requires DOSBox. Mouse-only controls. **Decky Plugin: Not Supported**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
publisher: Virgin Interactive Entertainment (Europe) Ltd., Virgin Interactive Entertainment, Inc., Revolution Software
description: Beneath a Steel Sky is a cyberpunk, point and click, adventure game. You assume the role of Robert Foster and embark on a quest to make the world a better place, along with your robot companion Joey.
